metaDescription: Data Scientist, AI Research Engineer and developer. I am passionate about Deep Learning, especially generative models and their applications that can help in solving real-world problems.
about: I am a passionate Data Scientist and Generative AI Research Engineer with a Masters in Data Science and AI. I have a deep understanding of the latest advancements in the field. My expertise lies in working cutting-edge language models and natural language processing applications that push the boundaries of what's possible with AI. I am dedicated to leveraging my skills to develop innovative solutions that solve complex problems and drive positive change in the world.

hero.title: Sai Sri Harsha Surampudi
hero.description: Data Scientist and Generative AI Research Engineer with a Masters in Data Science and AI, specializing in natural language processing applications.

projects.title: Long-Form Question Answering in Legal Natural Language Processing
projects.description: Developed a synthetic dataset using large language models to tackle the challenge of long-form question answering in the legal domain. Fine-tuned smaller language models on the dataset, resulting in improved response quality and interpretability. Conducted comprehensive evaluations using multiple metrics and human assessment to validate the model's performance. This project contributes to the growing body of research in legal NLP and showcases techniques for enhancing automated question-answering systems.

projects.title: Quantum Machine Learning: Literature Review and Comparative Analysis
projects.description: Led a team of seven in analyzing the computational advantages of quantum machine learning algorithms over classical approaches. Developed strong research, analytical, and project management skills while exploring innovative technologies. Presented findings to a large audience, receiving positive feedback on the depth and clarity of the analysis

projects.title: AI Lyricist (Telugu)
projects.description: Developed an AI-based lyricist that generates Telugu lyrics based on user-provided instructions. The project aims to assist with brainstorming and idea generation in the creative process of lyric writing. By leveraging advanced natural language processing techniques, such as retrieval-augmented generation, the AI model is able to generate lyrics that are relevant to the given input. The project includes a user-friendly interface for easy interaction and showcases the potential of AI in aiding creative tasks.

experience.title: Data Scientist and Software Engineer
experience.description: Building AI, NLP, and data science solutions for SEO challenges, utilizing Python, OpenAI API, LangChain, PyTorch, and Transformers. Researching the impact of Generative AI based improvements in search engines (Google SGE, Bing Chat, Perplexity.ai etc) on rankings.

experience.title: MSc Data Science & Artificial Intelligence
